title: The Ledger Unearthed
outcome: Protestors uncover a charred exception ledger listing daily privileges for key figures, sparking outrage over BCI corruption. Council power struggles and citizen demands for fairness escalate as protests broaden and the system’s legitimacy crumbles.

events.description: Amid continuing demonstrations, citizens discover a fragmentary, burned paper ledger during cleanup near Council chambers.
The ledger lists numerous daily privilege exceptions for Council members and favored residents, undermining claims of system neutrality.
The revelation spreads rapidly, fueling demands for all privilege exceptions to be voided and universal BCI rules imposed.
Directorate members pressure for martial law; Harmonists and Innovators clash over how to address the legitimacy crisis and handle mass gatherings.
Citywide protests intensify as BCI restrictions shift erratically amid growing Council indecision. Public trust collapses further, paralyzing city governance.
